item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, October 26, 2024 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. New Windows Driver Signature bypass allows kernel rootkit installs (150 points | 80 comments)

3. Deep dive: the instability of op-amps (18 points | discuss)

8. Show HN: Simple Text Blog (28 points | 11 comments)

10. In the US, regenerative farming practices require unlearning past advice (233 points | 93 comments)

13. Adventures in algorithmic trading on the Runescape Grand Exchange (139 points | 24 comments)

21. Scientists Mapping Landslide Risk in Alaska. Some Homeowners Don't Want to Know. (5 points | 2 comments)
22. Ikigai: The Japanese Secret to a Joyful Life (143 points | 82 comments)
23. The Rise of Giant Pumpkins (34 points | 18 comments)

26. OmniParser for Pure Vision Based GUI Agent (133 points | 28 comments)

28. Fitting a Forth in 512 bytes (2021) (53 points | 3 comments)
29. Pygfx (228 points | 45 comments)
30. Universal optimality of Dijkstra via beyond-worst-case heaps (182 points | 43 comments)
